title.text: Last Words Sharing Is Caring: The Future of Shared Tasks

tableCaptions.text: Table 1  Statistics on participation of organizers and companies in our sample of shared tasks.  The "Avg. participants" column shows the average number of participating teams. We  also show the average normalized rank, where the normalized rank of a team is given by  (ranking of team − 1)/(number of teams − 1). The column "Paper" indicates the percentage  of participating teams that have submitted a system description.
